title: Returning the Favor!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Kotori-chan, thanks to you, the photoshoot in the maid outfit went really well. I really appreciate it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Really!? I’m so glad~ I’m looking forward to seeing the magazine!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>So, I want to do something to thank you, Kotori-chan, but......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hehe, don’t worry about it. I had a lot of fun being able to help you out, Karin-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I can’t just let it go like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>So today, let me treat you, Kotori-chan. I even borrowed the costume.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eeeeh!? Umm, well... I’m used to treating others, but I’m not really used to being treated...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That’s perfect! I’ll treat you to the fullest. I even asked Emma and Kanata to prepare afternoon tea for us. Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Aaah! I’m excited for afternoon tea, but I’m so nervous~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
